name: Mathematics
description: You can not imagine of giving admission test without having mass control and confidence about mathematics . Our Math course will help you to improve your mathematical skills as you will be practicing rapidly on previous admission papers . Also you have to give tests regularly that will make you strong in math .

name: Higher Math
description: Higher math is so important for doing far better in admission tests of big collages . Higher math requires a lot  of practice and thinking ability . In our 5 months course , your brain will be grown up for critical thinking as our mentor will give extra practice tasks on every topics.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemistry has a lot to learn . If  want your self to be admitted to  a good collage , you have to know much more about chemistry . Our mentor will guide you in this learning process with regular test and quiz . After this course you can crack admission test of any collage if you will work hard .

name: Physics
description: As your SSC exam has finished , we can consider you have gained basic knowledge about physics . In this course , you will rock on every chapter of physics . our mentor will present all topics very easily and make you confident on physics .

name: Bangla
description: Bangla is not so critical subject but it is also very important for any admission test . We are committed to make you confident on Bangla . Our Bangla mentor will cover your text book in 4 months and  in next 1 month  ,she will take rapid test and revision for more clearity .

name: English
description: In this English crash course , our mentor will teach you English language from basic to advanced and will help you to improve your spoken english skill . We will give you quiz and take tests on english . We will cover all necessary topics for admission test . Our mentor will support you any time you need and they will give notes for future revision

name: Biology
description: In our Biology courser , you will learn all topics of your  biology book which are important for any  type of admission test or upcoming career life . We will take quiz and  tests regularly to check your progress . You will be given notes after each and every class so that you can revise in your free time . Our support team is always active for your queries .
